little planet in the snow

2010-12-08


frozen lake little planet from Forrest O.
(Loop in HD: here)

Have you ever beaten the wrong tool into submission, getting it to almost do what you want with much pain, only to realize that you had another right tool all along? Even though Photoshop opens video files, it can't really handle them... I should have started with After Effects.
